name: ⑨リコーダーバカルテット
summary:
Originals:
    01: Touhou Koumakyou / A Soul as Red as a Ground Cherry & Apparitions Stalk the Night
    02: Touhou Fuujinroku / Because the Princess Inada Is Scolding Me
    03: Touhou Chireiden / Green-Eyed Jealousy
    04: Touhou Eiyashou / Deaf to All but the Song
    05: Touhou Chireiden / Satori Maiden ~ 3rd eye
    06: Touhou Eiyashou / Illusionary Night & Stirring an Autumn Moon
    07: Touhou Suimusou / Demystify Feast &  Onigashima in the Fairyland
    08: Touhou Fuujinroku / Tomorrow Will Be Special; Yesterday Was Not
    09: Touhou Youyoumu / Mystic Oriental Dream ~ Ancient Temple
    10: Touhou Youyoumu / Bloom Nobly, Cherry Blossoms of Sumizome ~ Border of Life, & Hiroari Shoots a Strange Bird ~ Till When?
    11: Touhou Kaeidzuka / Gensokyo, Past and Present ~ Flower Land
    12: Touhou Kaeidzuka / Gensokyo, Past and Present ~ Flower Land
    13: Touhou Koumakyou / Shanghai Teahouse ~ Chinese Tea
    14: original composition
    15: Touhou Eiyashou / Lunatic Eyes ~ Invisible Full Moon
    16: Touhou Kaeidzuka / Wind God Girl
    17: Touhou Fuujinroku / Fall of Fall ~ Autumnal Waterfall
    18: Touhou Koumakyou / Beloved Tomboyish Girl
info:
• 厂牌: 街角麻婆豆
  • 别名: ⑨ Recorder Quartet
  • 版本特性: MM-07
  • 发售日期: 2009.10.11 (东方红楼梦5)
  • 价格: 1900 JPY (Package Price)
  • 播放时长: 39:21
  • 碟片数量: 1
  • Arranger: 中雑魚酒菜, かっつん
  • 艺术家: 中雑魚酒菜, ラステイル, Kain, リョーマ, R, The Friend=NMD
